Heart of Stone (PG-13)

Movie |

Espionage

  • Release Date: 11 Aug 2023
  • Genre(s): Thriller, Action
  • Language(s): English
  • Director(s): Tom Harper, Melina Burns
  • Cast(s): Gal Gadot, Jamie Dornan, Alia Bhatt, Matthias Schweighöfer, Sophie Okonedo See all Cast & Crew
  • Duration: 2h 10min
  • Music: Steven Price
  • Similar To: John Wick: Chapter 4, Fast X
  • Story:

    Rachel Stone is an intelligence operative, the only woman who stands between her powerful, global, peacekeeping organization and the loss of its most valuable — and dangerous — asset.
